entries.name: 7th Legion
entries.description: The Alliance’s elite expeditionary legion, deployed in global conflicts.

entries.name: Aldor
entries.description: Draenei priests and vindicators holding the line for the Light in Shattrath.

entries.name: Alliance Expedition
entries.description: Alliance forces sent through the Dark Portal during the Second War.

entries.name: Argent Crusade
entries.description: Crusaders formed from Silver Hand and Argent Dawn to purge undead blight.

entries.name: Argent Dawn
entries.description: Scholars and crusaders who first opposed the Scourge’s rise.

entries.name: Army of the Light
entries.description: A trans-world crusade tempered by endless war against the Burning Legion.

entries.name: Ashen Verdict
entries.description: Alliance of the Argent Crusade and Knights of the Ebon Blade formed to assault Icecrown Citadel.

entries.name: Blood Knights
entries.description: Silvermoon’s paladin order—once controversial, now steadfast stewards of the Light.

entries.name: Burning Legion
entries.description: A vast army of demons led by Sargeras, seeking the annihilation of all life.

entries.name: Cenarion Circle
entries.description: Wardens of the wilds, mediating between mortal settlements and living lands.

entries.name: The Conclave
entries.description: Priesthood uniting diverse callings of Light and Shadow at Netherlight Temple.

entries.name: Council of the Black Harvest
entries.description: An assembly of master warlocks studying and wielding fel for their own designs.

entries.name: Consortium
entries.description: A loose affiliation of ethereal traders and smugglers operating in Outland.

entries.name: Dawnblade (Sunfury)
entries.description: Elite Sunfury troops deployed to secure the Isle of Quel’Danas.

entries.name: Devouring Host
entries.description: An near-endless army of void aberrations in service to Xal'atath, once the Harbinger of Dimensius the Devourer who has set her sights on Azeroth.

entries.name: Earthen Ring
entries.description: Unified shamans brokering peace among the elements and mortals.

entries.name: Eclipsion (Sunfury)
entries.description: A Sunfury-aligned sect operating from Shadowmoon Valley under demonic influence.

entries.name: Ethereum
entries.description: A militant ethereal organization seeking revenge on Dimensius-the All Devouring, who have fallen far from their path.

entries.name: Explorers' League
entries.description: Dwarven-led explorers cataloging (and occasionally detonating) the world’s mysteries.

entries.name: Farstriders
entries.description: Rangers of Quel’Thalas—light on their feet, lethal at range, guardians of the borders.

entries.name: Firewing (Sunfury)
entries.description: A Sunfury contingent entrenched in Terokkar and Hellfire, enforcing Kael’thas’ will.

entries.name: Illidari
entries.description: Illidan’s demon hunters and allies committed to annihilating the Burning Legion.

entries.name: Kingdom of Quel'Thalas
entries.description: The High Home of the Quel'dorei, and later the Sin'dorei after the kingdom's ruining by the Scourge. Still clinging to life, the Sin'dorei have reclaimed much of their ancestral homeland and have driven out the undead, giving their future another chance to shine.

entries.name: Kirin Tor
entries.description: Dalaran’s ruling body, balancing research, neutrality, and the needs of a perilous world.

entries.name: Kor'kron
entries.description: The Warchief’s elite guard and shock troops of the Horde.

entries.name: K'areshi Trust
entries.description: An ethereal mercantile consortium focused on preventing the return of Dimensius-the All Devouring, and saving the remains of K'aresh.

entries.name: Knights of the Ebon Blade
entries.description: A re-forged order using the darkness that once bound them to fight greater evils.

entries.name: Magisters
entries.description: Silvermoon’s policy arm for arcane law, security, and research.

entries.name: Order of the Silver Hand
entries.description: The ancient paladin order originally founded to defend Azeroth from the Horde through the Light.

entries.name: Order of the Unseen Path
entries.description: Hunters bound by oath to defend the wilds and track threats from the shadows.

entries.name: Reliquary
entries.description: Scholars and dig teams racing the Explorers’ League for history’s prizes.

entries.name: Scourge
entries.description: The vast undead army commanded by the Lich King. Originally created by the Burning Legion, the Scourge went rogue and has ever since committed itself to eradicating the living.

entries.name: Scryers
entries.description: Blood elf seers who broke with Kael’thas to defend Shattrath and Outland’s fragile peace.

entries.name: Shadowblade (Sunfury)
entries.description: Stealth and reconnaissance specialists within the Sunfury ranks.

entries.name: Sha'tar
entries.description: The naaru-led faction allied with the Aldor and Scryers in Shattrath City.

entries.name: Shadow Council
entries.description: Warlock conspirators manipulating fel bargains and puppet regimes.

entries.name: Shadowguard
entries.description: A sect of the Ethereum that are hell bent on resurrecting Dimensius-the All Devouring.

entries.name: Shattered Sun Offensive
entries.description: A joint force of Aldor, Scryers, and Sha'tari to retake Quel'Danas.

entries.name: Silver Covenant
entries.description: High elven hardliners who safeguard Dalaran’s neutrality and Quel’dorei dignity.

entries.name: Sunfury
entries.description: Kael’thas Sunstrider’s blood elf army stationed across Outland and Quel'Danas.

entries.name: Sunreavers
entries.description: A Silvermoon-led bloc within the Kirin Tor advocating Horde participation and arcane pragmatism.

entries.name: Tirisgarde
entries.description: A Kirin Tor strike arm reformed to police rogue magic and defend Dalaran.

entries.name: Titan Pantheon
entries.description: The assembly of world-shaping Titans who guide—or judge—the cosmos.

entries.name: True Horde
entries.description: Garrosh Hellscream’s loyalists who followed him into the Siege of Orgrimmar and beyond.

entries.name: Valdrakken Accord
entries.description: A coalition of dragonflights and mortals united in the Dragon Isles.

entries.name: Elrendar Fellowship
entries.description: Coalition of dragonflights safeguarding Azeroth from threats like Malygos and the Scourge.

entries.name: Wyrmrest Accord
entries.description: Coalition of dragonflights safeguarding Azeroth from threats like Malygos and the Scourge.
